component.name: importEvents
component.description: Imports an event. This operation is used to add a private copy of an existing event to a calendar.

component.name: getEventInstances
component.description: Returns instances of the specified recurring event.

component.name: listEvents
component.description: Returns events on the specified calendar.

component.name: moveEvent
component.description: Moves an event to another calendar, i.e. changes an event's organizer.

component.name: patchEvents
component.description: Updates an event. This method supports patch semantics.

component.name: createQuickAddEvents
component.description: Creates an event based on a simple text string.
